alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Richland; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 3:50PM CDT until July 23 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Vernon County in southwestern Wisconsin... Richland County in southwestern Wisconsin... Northeastern Crawford County in southwestern Wisconsin... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 349 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Viroqua to 16 miles south of Westby, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Horrigan Ridge, Eagle Corners, Highway 80 And County C C, Woodstock, Gillingham, Bloom City and Fairview. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
